title: Maha civic polls: BJP trolls Raj Thackeray with order of 'rasmalai', Annamalai serves jab
content: In a light-hearted twist following the BJP's victory in the Maharashtra civic elections, MP PC Mohan cheekily took a dig at Raj Thackeray by referencing 'rajmalai'. This comes on the heels of Thackeray‚Äôs playful jab at K Annamalai, calling him 'rasmalai' during a spirited debate on Mumbai's essence.

title: BMC and other Maharashtra civic poll results 2026: Top 10 winners and losers
content: Maharashtra's civic elections saw a significant political shift as the BJP-led Mahayuti alliance secured a dominant victory, particularly in Mumbai's BMC. Devendra Fadnavis and the BJP celebrated substantial gains, ending Shiv Sena's long-held control. Uddhav Thackeray's Sena and the Congress faced major setbacks, while Raj Thackeray's MNS and Sharad Pawar's NCP also saw diminished influence.

title: Maha civic polls: CM Fadnavis credits Hindutva for big win; BJP set to name 25 mayors
content: The BJP-led Mahayuti has achieved a significant victory in Maharashtra's municipal elections. Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis credited the win to the party's development agenda. The alliance secured a majority in numerous municipal corporations, including the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation. This outcome reflects public trust in Prime Minister Modi's leadership and the alliance's focus on governance and infrastructure projects.

title: Marc Benioff's vision: Salesforce CEO recalls ‚ÄòDolphin‚Äô inspiration; how Oracle founder helped
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff revealed his company's origin story. He experienced a vision while swimming with dolphins in Hawaii. This led him to quit his job at Oracle. His mentor Larry Ellison provided initial funding. Benioff also mentioned a trip to India where his Guru emphasized giving back. This influenced Salesforce's business model.

title: ‚ÄòThank you Maharashtra!‚Äô PM Modi hails civic poll results; congratulates NDA workers
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated BJP workers and thanked Maharashtra's people for the NDA and Mahayuti's sweeping victory in municipal corporation elections. Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis attributed the success to a development-focused agenda, highlighting the alliance's strong performance, particularly in the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation.

title: Did Israel stop Trump's Iran strike? Mossad chief in US - why it signals bigger attack in works
content: Mossad chief David Barnea visited the US for talks on Iran, following a call between Trump and Netanyahu. Israel requested a delay on military action, citing concerns about retaliation and the effectiveness of proposed strikes. Meanwhile, US military assets are being deployed to the region as diplomatic channels remain open.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14bn, now they're clashing
content: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: From savers to investors: What Indian households are doing with their money?
content: Indian households are shifting from traditional savings like gold and cash to market-linked investments such as mutual funds and equities. This trend, accelerated by digital access and financial literacy, sees a significant rise in individual investors, particularly younger demographics and women, seeking inflation-beating returns.

title: Mumbai BMC election results 2026: Uddhav Thackeray's Shiv Sena's 30-year control collapses
content: Early trends indicate the Mahayuti alliance, led by BJP and Eknath Shinde's Shiv Sena, is poised to end the Shiv Sena (UBT)'s 30-year dominance in the BMC. The alliance is leading in over 110 wards, with BJP showing significant strength. Similar trends are observed in Pune, where BJP is displacing the Pawars.

title: Ryanair rejects Starlink service: CEO calls Musk ‚Äòidiot‚Äô
content: Ryanair's CEO, Michael O'Leary, labelled Elon Musk an 'idiot' after dismissing Starlink internet for flights. O'Leary cited increased fuel costs and passenger unwillingness to pay for Wi-Fi on short trips, a stance contrasting with other airlines adopting the service. Musk countered that airlines without internet will lose customers, sparking a public spat.

title: Tom Brady admits divorce with Gisele weighed on his final NFL season
content: Tom Brady admitted his divorce from Gisele B√ºndchen made his final NFL season emotionally draining. Speaking openly on The Herd, he said personal struggles affected his ability to play and helped him realize retirement was the right choice. After 23 seasons, Brady felt complete and chose to step away to focus on his children and life beyond football.

title: Pakistan's Babar furious at Steve Smith in BBL; video goes viral - Watch
content: Babar Azam was left furious during a BBL match when teammate Steve Smith refused a simple run to keep strike in the Power Surge. The incident occurred in the 11th over and went viral. Smith later smashed a record 32-run over and scored 100. Babar was dismissed soon after in frustration, but the Sixers won comfortably, with Smith named Player of the Match.

title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt's heartfelt life update amid team's tough season
content: The Kansas City Chiefs had a pretty disappointing season this time, but the billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has always been there for the team. Amid all the mess, Gracie Hunt has made a wholesome post about her life along with a few inspirational words that has moved fans. With the team's poor performance, many of their players are also getting trolled brutally.

title: India gets its 92nd GM: No coach, single father‚Äôs grind, and a dream vs Gukesh
content: Aaryan Varshney became India‚Äôs 92nd chess Grandmaster at 21, guided entirely by his father Gaurav, a single parent since Aaryan was five. With no coach, academies, or foreign training, Gaurav trained him at home using game analysis and ChessBase. Overcoming pandemic hurdles, Aaryan rose rapidly and now dreams of becoming a World Champion.

title: Mahindra XUV 3XO electric vs Tata Nexon: Subcompact EV comparison
content: As mentioned before, the Nexon EV gets two battery pack options - 30kWh and 45kWh. Powering both variants is a front-mounted electric motor that delivers 145 hp and 215 nm. The 38kWh version offers an ARAI-certified range of 325km, while the 45kWh version provides a range of 489km on a full charge.

title: $180bn and counting: Why US arms Israel like no other; the ultimate defence pact decoded
content: Israel's decades-long deep reliance on US military, diplomatic, and political backing is being re-examined. Prime Minister Netanyahu's call to taper US aid to zero within a decade signals a shift towards strategic self-reliance, amidst growing US involvement in Israel's war decisions and evolving American public opinion.

title: Maha civic polls: Mahayuti surge dents Thackeray camps; Cong falters - highlights
content: The Mahayuti alliance, comprising BJP and Shiv Sena, has secured a dominant performance in Maharashtra's local body elections, leading in key municipal corporations including Mumbai, Pune, and Nagpur. This victory is being hailed as a mandate for Prime Minister Modi's policies and nationalism, with opposition parties like Shiv Sena (UBT), NCP, and Congress facing significant setbacks.

title: ‚ÄòShort on cricket‚Äô: India coach explains Rohit's quiet ODI run amid Kohli surge
content: While Virat Kohli shines with consecutive fifties, Rohit Sharma faces scrutiny in the ongoing ODI series. Assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate attributes Sharma's recent modest scores to challenging pitch conditions and a lack of recent match practice, emphasising his team-first approach and overall strong ODI record.

title: Capital chokes: GRAP-III reimposed in Delhi-NCR; air quality likely to turn 'severe'
content: Delhi-NCR faces renewed pollution crisis as authorities re-implement GRAP-III restrictions. Non-essential construction, demolition, and mining activities are halted. Vehicular curbs target older diesel and petrol models. Essential services and critical projects are exempted, with schools offering hybrid learning. This move aims to combat the 'severe' air quality forecast.

title: ‚ÄòLeave by any means available‚Äô: India keeps close watch on Iran amid escalating tensions
content: The Ministry of External Affairs has urged around 9,000 Indian citizens, primarily students in Iran, to depart the country due to recent developments. Advisories have been issued for both those in Iran and those planning to travel there. India is actively monitoring the situation and preparing to assist citizens wishing to return home.

title: Latur: Cong wins LMC polls with 43 of 70 seats; BJP settles for 22
content: Congress is leading in the Latur Municipal Corporation elections, ahead of the BJP in early trends. This closely watched contest unfolds amidst Maharashtra's ongoing civic polls, where the ruling alliance has shown strong performance. The LMC results follow a tight race in 2017, with the BJP then emerging as the largest party.

title: Stock market open on Sunday for Budget 2026! BSE, NSE release schedule for Feb 1 - see details
content: Stock markets will observe a rare Sunday trading session on February 1, allowing investors immediate reaction to the Union Budget 2026-27. Both BSE and NSE announced full-day trading, with pre-open from 9 am to 9:08 am and regular trading from 9:15 am to 3:30 pm.

title: Mustafizur row: 'I've received death threats'- Bangladesh players' chief speaks out
content: Bangladesh Cricketers‚Äô Welfare Association president Mohammad Mithun faces death threats after advocating for players subjected to derogatory remarks.  He insists his actions are solely for player welfare, especially with the T20 World Cup approaching.  Mithun expressed shock at the threats, emphasizing his commitment to player rights and national interest, not politics.

title: 'Ramayana is Hindu, I'm...': AR Rahman on doing music for Ranbir Kapoor, Sai Pallavi starreer
content: AR Rahman discusses his collaboration with Hans Zimmer for Nitesh Tiwari's 'Ramayana,' highlighting his respect for Hindu mythology despite being Muslim. He emphasizes the epic's moral core and the importance of seeking wisdom universally. Rahman sees the project as a global message of love, uniting diverse backgrounds.

title: Watch: Dramatic video shows IDF Black Hawk crashing after harness tore mid-lift; no injuries reported
content: A Black Hawk helicopter, known as the Yanshuf, crashed while being airlifted after an emergency landing earlier this week due to severe weather in Gush Etzion. The harness reportedly tore mid-lift, causing the helicopter to fall near a house. No injuries were reported, and an investigation has been ordered.

title: The Butterfly Effect: How Oct 7 made America the world's 'daddy'
content: That day, a terrorist organisation‚Äôs desire to imbibe a little culture by paragliding into a music festival ended up rewriting the world order. The story that followed could have been directed by Quentin Tarantino: gory, non-linear, with all threads interconnected and a few perverts thrown in. Israel‚Äôs furious response, with help from Uncle Sam, led to the dismantling of Iran‚Äôs Axis of Resistance, tangentially hastened Trump‚Äôs return to the White House, and reminded Russia, China, and even Europe who is Daddy.

title: PCMC election results: Pawars fail to deliver in Pimpri-Chinchwad, Pune; BJP takes major lead
content: The Nationalist Congress Party, split into factions led by Ajit Pawar and Sharad Pawar, faced a significant setback in the Pimpri-Chinchwad and Pune municipal elections. Despite campaigning together, both factions suffered losses, with the BJP leading in a majority of wards. This performance raises questions about the potential merger of the NCP factions.

title: Jalna civic polls: Gauri Lankesh murder accused Shrikant Pangarkar celebrates victory
content: In an unexpected political victory, Shrikant Pangarkar, a figure entwined in the Gauri Lankesh murder case, has declared independence triumphantly by winning a seat on the Jalna Municipal Corporation. Freshly released on bail, he previously attempted to align with the Shiv Sena, but that affiliation was cut short.

title: Gold price today: How much 22K, 24K gold cost in Delhi, Mumbai & other cities ‚Äì Check rates
content: Gold prices experienced a slight dip in domestic markets on Friday as profit-taking emerged after international bullion retreated from record highs. A firmer US dollar contributed to the decline in overseas trade. While most major Indian cities saw a marginal increase in gold prices, Chennai recorded a decrease.

title: 'Why does this happen?': Ashwin questions Arshdeep exclusion under Gambhir
content: Veteran spinner Ravichandran Ashwin has voiced strong criticism of the team management's handling of Arshdeep Singh, who has been overlooked for the first two ODIs against New Zealand. Ashwin emphasized the detrimental impact on a player's confidence and argued Arshdeep's consistent performances warrant automatic selection, questioning the logic of his late inclusion.

title: How speed, skill, & science saved Mumbai man from major stroke, triggered by neck pain
content: A Mumbai man's life was saved after a sudden stroke, thanks to his wife's quick thinking and a hospital team's swift intervention. Arriving within the critical 20-minute window, doctors successfully removed a blockage in his brain artery, restoring blood flow and reversing severe symptoms. This case highlights the vital importance of rapid medical attention for stroke victims.

title: 'Little bit of hate': Chahal reveals life after divorce from Dhanashree
content: Indian spinner Yuzvendra Chahal says his divorce from Dhanashree Verma is a closed chapter, emotionally settled once legal proceedings ended. Choosing peace over bitterness, he says both have moved on happily. Unfazed by rumours, dating speculation, or online trolling, Chahal focuses on personal growth, maturity, and moving forward without resentment.

title: What makes a neighbourhood good for living? 6 things to look for before buying a property
content: Choosing a home involves more than just the property itself; the neighborhood significantly impacts daily life and investment value. Key factors to consider include accessibility to work and amenities, safety and security, environmental cleanliness, community feel, and future growth potential. A well-chosen locale ensures comfort and happiness, making it a wise long-term decision.

title: Raped as minor & killed at 18: Diary helps Delhi cops nab relative
content: Seven months after an 18-year-old girl's murder, police apprehended a relative for alleged sexual assault during her childhood. The diary entry revealed the abuse, which occurred when the accused was also a minor. Separately, the girl's classmate confessed to her murder, claiming she attacked him first. The victim's father alleged ongoing harassment.

title: Where is Riyan Parag? Inside details of all-rounder's recovery at BCCI CoE - exclusive
content: Riyan Parag, one of the early picks in Gautam Gambhir‚Äôs coaching era, is nearing full fitness after a shoulder injury layoff. Currently training at the BCCI‚Äôs Centre of Excellence, the all-rounder has resumed full-intensity bowling and batting. With injuries hitting India‚Äôs white-ball setup, Parag could re-enter contention pending clearance.

title: Kohli on top: ICC corrects ranking error after backlash; India great moves to all-time third
content: Virat Kohli's return to the No. 1 ODI batting ranking was marred by an ICC error regarding his days at the top. Initially stated as 825 days, the figure was corrected to 1,547 days, placing him third all-time and first among Indians. This correction followed a backlash from fans and statisticians.

title: Skip Bayless accuses LeBron James of trying to push Austin Reaves out
content: LeBron James' agent, Rich Paul, sparked controversy by suggesting a trade for Austin Reaves, a move James denies involvement in. Despite James' insistence, analysts like Skip Bayless question his influence, citing past patterns. Meanwhile, the Lakers grapple with defensive issues as Reaves, sidelined by injury, remains engaged with the team.

title: Inside Mike Tomlin's decision to walk away from the Steelers
content: 'It was dead silent' when the coach stunned the Steelers' locker room. Here's what we know about what's next.

title: Dodgers strike again, land Tucker, sources say
content: The World Series champion Dodgers added another big bat to an already-potent lineup Thursday night, agreeing to a four-year, $240 million deal with prized free agent Kyle Tucker, sources told ESPN.

title: Dozens charged with college hoops point shaving
content: A college basketball point-shaving scheme involving more than 39 players on 17 teams resulted in dozens of games in the previous two seasons being fixed by a gambling ring that included a former NBA player, according to a federal indictment.

title: Warriors prove Kuminga 'not a distraction' in win
content: The Warriors kept their focus on the court, saying the talk of Jonathan Kuminga's trade demand was "not a distraction" in Thursday's win over the Knicks.

title: Darnold expects to play despite new oblique injury
content: Sam Darnold expects to play Saturday in the team's divisional round playoff game against the 49ers despite being added to the injury report Thursday with an oblique injury.

title: Vandy LB among 5 denied injunction for 5th year
content: Five college football players seeking to play a fifth season this fall had their motions for a preliminary injunction denied Thursday by a federal judge.

title: Philly GM: 'Hard to find great players' like Brown
content: Eagles GM Howie Roseman said players such as A.J. Brown are in short supply when asked if he would be open to trading the star wide receiver this offseason.

title: Oklahoma QB Mateer, LB Lewis to return in '26
content: Oklahoma quarterback John Mateer and linebacker Kip Lewis will return in 2026, the school announced on Thursday.

title: Nacua's brother won't be charged after taking car
content: Samson Nacua, the brother of Rams wide receiver Puka Nacua, will not be charged after he was arrested last month for allegedly taking a vehicle without the owner's consent, with investigators now telling ABC7 that they believe it was accidental.

content: Is the ACC back? Eight single-digit seeds -- including one on the top line -- and a couple of bubble teams would suggest so.

content: As the USMNT's 2026 begins, we rank the U21 American players on the national team radar. From Europe to MLS, here's the top 15.

content: From Fernando Mendoza and Jeremiyah Love to Jacob Rodriguez and Rueben Bain Jr., here are the best of the best.

content: The Giants are finalizing a deal for John Harbaugh to become their next coach. It has been a rough decade for New York, but this hire could finally turn the tide.

content: Even as beards freeze and fingers lose feeling, NFL players find ways to handle ridiculously cold temperatures.

content: Spurs center Victor Wembanyama and forward Keldon Johnson showed up to shoot around on Thursday with bald heads.

content: Track all the latest MLB free agency and trade news with fantasy baseball analysis from Tristan H. Cockcroft and Eric Karabell.

content: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from notable players such as Kon Knueppel, Trae Young, Jalen Johnson and more.

title: CM vows to take up development of erstwhile Adilabad district on par with Palamuru
content: Mr. Revanth Reddy says he is ready to meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi or anyone umpteen times for sake of State‚Äôs development

title: President Murmu attends ‚Äòmahayagna‚Äô in Jaipur
content: President Droupadi Murmu chanted mantras, offered final oblations and prayed for peace, prosperity and well-being of the country and Rajasthan

title: Congress may field Shashi Tharoor from Nemom
content: According to Congress sources,  Tharoor‚Äôs candidature  is favoured by the Congress high command rather than the State unit, with the United Democratic Front bidding to come back to power after 10 years

content: Shincy Siju sings Radhike ghanashyama varnante..., composed by Anand Kavumvattam, exceptionally well at the Light Music competition

title: EU leaders to be chief guests at Republic Day function
content: ‚ÄòVande Mataram‚Äô will be the central focus of Republic Day Celebrations-2026, with tableaux from six States and departments highlighting the theme, says Defence Secretary

title: HC sets aside life term awarded to murder convict, sees denial of fair trial
content: Division Bench says trial judge assumed the role of public prosecutor and did ‚Äòchief examination‚Äô herself, exceeding the power vested in the court

title: Government announced subsidy scheme for cardamom farmers under KERA project
content: ‚Çπ2,365 crore earmarked for replanting of cardamom, rubber, and coffee, with funding shared between World Bank (70%) and State government (30%)

title: Five booked, expelled for assaulting Assamese student at Central university in Madhya Pradesh
content: Annupur SP says no racial slurs were used by the accused or mentioned in the victim‚Äôs complaint; says accused were drunk and got into a brawl, as some had earlier lived in the hostel room used by the victim

title: Democratic institutions need to be transparent, responsive, accountable to people: Speaker Om Birla
content: Consensus and dissent are both strengths of democracy, but must be expressed within the framework of parliamentary propriety, the Speaker said; conference discusses Parliamentary challenges in the age of AI and social media

title: ‚ÄòThank you, Maharashtra‚Äô: On civic poll results, PM Modi says NDA's record of development struck a chord
content: The prime minister said the results of various municipal corporation elections indicate that the NDA's bond with the people of Maharashtra has further deepened

title: Behind Bengaluru slums, growth and demolition drives
content: Bengaluru has repeatedly made headlines for a series of demolitions targeting what authorities describe as ‚Äúundeclared‚Äù settlements.

title: Cybercrime police arrest 25 persons linked to various frauds
content: A majority of the arrests were linked to online trading frauds, which accounted for 12 of the 25 accused

title: Assam scientists probe Sun to rethink gravity
content: Tezpur University researchers found that even small changes in gravity could significantly affect how energy moves inside the Sun, increasing wave speeds and stability by up to 55%

title: Thousands celebrate four-century-old ‚ÄúPrabhalu Teertham‚Äù chariot festival in Konaseema
content: Carried on the shoulders of the locals, the chariots make their way through lush green paddy fields and along the irrigation canal, finally converging at Jaggannathota, before being immersed in the canal

title: Lord Balaji goes out on a ‚Äòhunting spree‚Äô in Tirumala
content: As part of the Kanuma celebrations, the Lord, equipped with ‚ÄòPanchayudhas‚Äô, was taken out in a grand procession to the ‚ÄòParvetu mandapam‚Äô situated amid the thick forest

title: Centre praises blindness control programme in A.P.
content: Free eye examinations are being conducted for government school students and spectacles are being distributed

title: BJP, Sena Ahead In BMC Polls, Thackerays To Lose Grip On Richest Civic Body
content: The BJP-led alliance is headed to a massive victory in the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) elections as the Thackerays lose grip on Mumbai's civic body after 25 years, with votes still being counted in 29 civic bodies across Maharashtra.

title: Given Away Devendra Ji For My Maharashtra: Amruta Fadnavis To NDTV
content: Riding high after the BJP emerged as the single largest party in the BMC elections, as well as overall in 29 civic bodies in Maharashtra, Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis' wife Amruta Fadnavis has said the people have voted for development.

title: Heliborne Op With Special Forces Target Kuki Insurgents In Manipur
content: Security forces on Friday conducted large-scale anti-insurgency operations at suspected hideouts in the interior areas of Manipur's Churachandpur district, an official said.

title: "Unbelievably Embarrassing": Outrage Over Machado's Nobel Prize Gift To Trump
content: Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado handed over her Nobel Peace Prize medal to Donald Trump during a meeting at the White House on Thursday, describing the gesture as "a recognition for his unique commitment with our freedom."

title: Will Be Venezuela's President "When The Right Time Comes", Says Machado
content: Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado says she will be elected president of her country "when the right time comes," according to an interview aired on Fox News on Friday.

title: Woman Sets Herself On Fire, Husband Records Video Instead Of Saving Her
content: When a 31-year-old woman immolated herself at home in Surat over a marital dispute, her husband recorded a video of the incident instead of saving her, leading police to file a case and arrest him on Friday.

title: 'Closely Monitoring Situation': Foreign Ministry On Indians In Iran
content: The Indian government has advised its nationals in Iran to leave the country in view of the volatile security situation, the Ministry of External Affairs said on Friday.

title: Centre Blocks 242 Illegal Betting, Gambling Website Links
content: The Centre today blocked 242 illegal betting and gambling website links as part of increased enforcement actions following the passage of the Online Gaming Act, government sources said.

title: "NDA's Track Record Struck A Chord": PM Modi On Maharashtra Civic Polls Win
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today thanked the people of Maharashtra for their support after the BJP won the election to the richest civic body, BMC, for the first time.

title: Here's What's Inside Trump-Branded Swag Bag, In Focus After Machado Visit
content: Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado presented her Nobel Peace Prize medal to US President Donald Trump during a meeting at the White House on January 15.

title: "I'm The Ocean": D Fadnavis' Old Poetic Lines Come True With BMC Win
content: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis' poetic comments from 2019 have suddenly become very relevant after the results of the BMC elections showed the BJP coming to power for the first time in the richest municipal body.

title: PM Modi To Visit Bengal Tomorrow, Flag Off Various Projects
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit West Bengal and Assam on January 17 and 18 where he will flag off India's first Vande Bharat sleeper train between Howrah and Guwahati.

title: Poll Officials Collect Documents From Amartya Sen's Ancestral Home For SIR
content: Election officials on Friday visited Nobel laureate economist Amartya Sen's residence at Bolpur in Birbhum district and collected the requisite documents in connection with the ongoing Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls in the state.

title: Opinion: Opinion | 'It'll Divide Society': Why Congress Buried The Mandal Report For Years
content: Indira Gandhi was vetoed four times by her cabinet colleagues from implementing the Mandal Commission report, something that could have been a game-changer for the Congress.

title: Danger Not To Marathis, But Their Parties' Existence: E Shinde On Thackerays
content: Pulling no punches after his party won the BMC elections in an alliance with the BJP, Shiv Sena President Eknath Shinde has said the existence of Uddhav Thackeray and Raj Thackeray's parties is in question.

title: Global Economy Expected To Be Stable But Risks Persist: World Economic Forum
content: The global economy is expected to stay fairly strong in 2026, but there are challenges ahead, according to the World Economic Forum (WEF).

title: Goa Club That Caught Fire Changed Names To Cover Violations: Pramod Sawant
content: Goa Chief Minister Pramod Sawant said 'Birch by Romeo Lane', the nightclub destroyed in a fire last month, claiming 25 lives, operated under different names over the years, and his government will conduct a probe into its violations since 1999.

title: UP Woman Poisons Children, Then Dies By Suicide Over Domestic Dispute
content: A 30-year-old woman allegedly poisoned her son and daughter to death before committing suicide by consuming the toxic substance following a domestic dispute in the Gaglaherhi area of the district, police said on Friday.

title: Mentally Challenged Man, 32, Beaten To Death By Father, Brother In Kerala
content: A man undergoing treatment for mental illness allegedly died after being assaulted by his father and brother here, police said on Friday.

title: Delhi Uses Rs 8-Crore High-Tech Finnish Machine To Tackle Yamuna Pollution
content: Delhi's Yamuna clean-up effort continues to zero in on its biggest trouble spot- the Najafgarh drain, which carries nearly 70 per cent of the pollution flowing into the river.

title: Expert Appraisal Committee insists on eco-friendly redesign for dugong conservation centre at¬†Manora in Thanjavur district
content: The committee coming under the Union Ministry of Environment, Forest, and Climate Change cites concerns over extensive concrete construction in ecologically sensitive coastal areas

title: First bull race of the season held in Vellore
content: It was held in Panamadangi, Sivanathapuram and Gudalavaripalli, with at least 150 bulls participating in each event.

title: Special train between Kottayam and Bengaluru Cantonment to clear festive rush
content: Southern Railway is operating a special train between Kottayam and Bengaluru Cantonment for one trip in each direction to avoid the rush of passengers during the Pongal festival, a release said.

title: CPI gearing up for public meeting in Khammam on January 18
content: Over 14,000 participants are expected to attend the event being held as part of the party‚Äôs centenary celebrations

title: India remains engaged with the U.S.: MEA on Chabahar port project
content: It is learnt that India is in the process of transferring approximately $120 million ‚Äî the amount it committed for the project ‚Äî as part of a move to end its direct exposure to the Chabahar port project

title: Six-member team to investigate death of teen athletes at SAI hostel
content: The team has started recording statements from fellow trainees and hostel staff, focussing on the contents of suicide notes recovered from the victims‚Äô clothing

title: A.P. CM, Deputy CM to perform bhumi puja for ‚Çπ13,000-crore green ammonia unit in Kakinada on January 17
content: Proposed on a 495-acre campus, the project aims at an annual production of one million metric tonnes of Green Ammonia and provide 2,600 jobs

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026| A poignant tale sensitively portrayed on mono act stage
content: Student enacts stories of makeup artiste Renju Renjimar and journalist Heidi Saadia, members of the transgender community, in her mono act performance

title: Govt. employees, pensioners betrayed even during Sankranti, says CPI
content: It failed to honour its election promises by not announcing DA, IR, or implementing the PRC, says party State secretary Eswaraiah

title: APSRTC bags national award for automatic announcement system
content: It reflects the corporation‚Äôs commitment to leveraging digital technologies for enhancing passenger services, says Vice-Chairman and Managing Director Dwaraka Tirumala Rao

title: 24 Keralites stranded in Iran reach out to Kerala govt. for repatriation
content: NoRKA-Roots has opened a help desk to assist Keralites in Iran in the wake of escalating anti-government protests in Iran

title: DA cannot be claimed as a matter of right, Kerala government informs HC
content: Government says this in a counter affidavit submitted in the court in response to a petition that sought the disbursal of DA arrears of government employees

title: Redgram procurement under MSP mechanism gains momentum in Andhra Pradesh
content: Over 1,286 MT has been procured as of January 12, 2026; So far, 29,627 farmers have registered for MSP procurement, reflecting significant participation from pulse growers, says official

title: Kochi Corporation faces uphill task as HC denies extension for eviction, rehabilitation in Konthuruthy
content: In an interim order dated December 16, 2025, the High Court ordered eviction with police assistance and tasked the Corporation and the Revenue department with finalising and implementing rehabilitation measures within four months

title: ‚ÄòWork Near Home‚Äô facilities will be established across Kerala: K.N. Balagopal
content: The facility, which will open in Kottarakara on January 19, offers 141 professional workspaces designed on a ‚ÄòPlug-and-Play‚Äô model. Nine other centres will soon be operational, focusing on enhancing local infrastructure and supporting women re-entering the workforce, while positioning Kerala as a global hub for skill development.

title: Maintenance and overhaul help AP-Genco increase generation at major thermal power units
content: Reduction in forced outages increases plant availability, resulting in generating a record 6,009 MW on January 4, 2026, says official

title: State budget: Tackling fiscal pressure a challenging task
content: Union Budget on February 1 is expected to offer some clarity on central transfers and grants to the state, which could influence Karnataka‚Äôs fiscal planning

title: CM Naidu approves A.P. FIRST Research Centre project in Tirupati
content: The proposed institution will support innovation, research, and skill development aligned with future technologies, says Chief Minister

title: Congress to have its Mayors in five cities, 350 corporators across Maharashtra: Sapkal
content: According to the Congress, the party is in a position to install its own Mayors in Latur, Chandrapur, Bhiwandi (Thane district), Parbhani and Kolhapur, which were among the 29 Municipal Corporations in Maharashtra

title: Fadnavis claims BJP-led victory in 25 of 29 Maharashtra municipal corporations, expands Hindutva definition

title: AP, Telangana officials to meet in Delhi on Jan. 30 to discuss river water management, PNLP
content: The committee set up by MoJS is headed by Chairman of the Central Water Commission; officials of GRMB, KRMB and NWDA too to attend the meeting

title: Twenty20 signals major strategy shift, open doors to potential alliance with fronts in Assembly polls
content: Sabu M. Jacob, chief coordinator of the party, says no front will be considered untouchable as long as an ideal alliance deal that allows the outfit to retain its identity is on the table

title: Jagan condemns murder of YSRCP activist in Palnadu district
content: The murder reflects the growing intolerance and political vendetta being unleashed by the TDP leaders, the YSRCP chief alleges, and says that law and order has deteriorated in the State

title: Excessive dependence on AI could erode higher-order thinking: AI expert-educator Clif Kussmaul
content: Addressing widespread fears about job losses, the expert opined that history shows new technologies tend to expand human work rather than eliminate it.

title: News or noise: Breakout season on tap for Arizona's Jordan Lawlar?
content: we're paying attention to what's going on and are here to let you know about the top stories that might have gone under your radar . if they're something you need to file away for draft day or are they likely to have little impact when all is said and done? read on and find out if these breaking developments are truly news or if it's just noise .

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, each team's midseason fantasy MVP
content: we're identifying the midseason fantasy hockey MVP for all 32 clubs . it's not too late to sign up for ESPN Fantasy Hockey . a panel of commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday .

title: Ranking the top 25 women's players midway through 2025-26
content: Sarah Strong topped ESPN's preseason ranking of the 25 best players in women's college basketball for 2025-26 . she hasn't budged since, but the rest of the list has changed a lot . the SEC is the top conference with 13 players appearing on the midseason list .

title: Power Rankings: How far Michigan, Iowa State, Vanderbilt drop after losses
content: the Wolverines and Cyclones have a long list of blowout victories . they own a 23-point road rout at Purdue . a shuffle in ESPN's Power Rankings has prompted a massive drop .

title: 2026 draft: Which underclassmen have declared?
content: the 2026 draft is three months away, so the class is starting to take shape . the deadline for underclassmen to declare for this draft class was January 14 . players from both teams meet in the college football playoff national championship .

title: Power Rankings: SEC shaping national title race
content: the day-to-day challenges of January are key in putting that picture together . the AP-ranked SEC currently has nine teams battling each other for supremacy . they have already met this season in a game that didn't count in the standings .

title: Wolverine legacy: Jamal Crawford's son, JJ, earns offer from his father's alma mater
content: the son of 20-year NBA vet jamal Crawford received an offer from Michigan . "Blessed to receive my 12th division 1 offer from the University of Michigan" the 6-foot-4 combo guard is currently teamed up with the no. 1 player in the class of 2026 .

title: Rams-Bears set to join list of coldest playoff games
content: temperatures could drop to single digits for divisional round game between los Angeles Rams and the Chicago Bears . if 2 degrees is where we end up, the Rams-Bears still won't be among the top five coldest playoff games . the 1967 NFL championship reigns supreme as the coldest postseason game .

title: What will Mets do after losing Tucker sweepstakes? Will Philly get Bichette? Latest on NL East
content: the nl East's offseason activity so far begins with what has happened . it's been a shocking overhaul in Queens that has fans on edge . the Atlanta Braves have addressed their biggest needs, the Philadelphia Phillies have been active .

title: From a client call to suiting up for a Chicago Blackhawks game: Inside David Nozzolillo's wild Friday
content: nozzolillo was on the phone with a client until 5 p.m. and missed a call from Danny Tranchida . the 45-year-old's nights are often spent in the beer leagues . he was a former goalie at lake forest college .

title: 10 NBA teams that could swing trade season's final 20 days
content: the league's three-week sprint to the Feb. 5 trade deadline is here . many contenders are still deciding on a direction . a weekly trip around the Association focuses on those teams trying to add to their rosters .

title: MLB offseason grades: The Dodgers do it again! Grading deal for Tucker
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . the deal: four years, $240 million with opt-outs after 2027 and 2028 seasons Grade: A-Despite the high grade for this deal, I'll begin with a counterintuitive .
